title: Leading insurance brokers U.S. 2018 , by revenue
summary: This chart shows the Leading insurance brokers in the U.S. competirion .
\\n From the chart we see that the BB&T_Insurance_Holdings_Inc. Month made the Leading billion by some margin , with only 1.32 .
Aon_P.L.C. and Marsh_&_McLennan_Cos._Inc. made a respectable 4.65 and 7.52 billion , with Acrisure_LLC and Arthur_J._Gallagher_&_Co. not far behind , at 1.32 and 3.57 respectively .
gold: With revenue amounting to over seven billion U.S. dollars in 2018 , Marsh & McLennan Cos. Inc. topped the list of leading insurance brokers in the country . In that year , they were followed by Aon P.L.C . , Willis Towers Watson P.L.C .
